experience.details: Collaborated with the team and client to achieve common goals. Also, solved problems on a regular basis and performed system design for the assigned project. Additionally, performed DevOps related tasks.

Collaborated with the team and client to achieve common goals. Also, solved problems on a regular basis and performed system design for the assigned project. Additionally, performed DevOps related tasks.

Worked with .NET 6, Azure Cosmos DB and other Microsoft Azure services such as Azure Web PubSub, Azure EventHub and Azure AD B2C. Also, learned software development best practices and application of agile methodologies.
